1245100.name: Vanguard: Normandy 1944 Soundtrack
1245100.description:
The original 'Vanguard: Normandy 1944' soundtrack composed by Callum Bigden. This album contains all 11 tracks from the game ranging from the main theme, boisterous "Join the Vanguard" as featured in the game trailer to the contemplative "Where Are You" which was first released on Remembrance Day in commemoration of the lives lost during the war.

The album also includes themes for the maps Pegasus Bridge, Merville Battery & Lion-sur-Mer as well as for the British and German factions.
